title: The Challenger

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, you may choose a player. Tomorrow during the day, a soldier guards that player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only send a soldier into the town square 2 times.
- Appears innocent
- During the day, all players are informed that a soldier is stationed in the town square, and learn who the soldier is guarding. If the guarded player would be hanged, the soldier instead shoots any target that The Challenger chooses, dealing a basic attack and ending the day immediately.
- After the first time you guard an innocent player with a soldier, you refill all charges.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all opposition to the Elites.

desc:
Post 4901
*I need your vote, brother! The countryside is dangerous, and I'm the fix to that.*
- The Personification of Militarization
